item.title: BTCS CEO: Naked Short Selling Must Be Stopped, Aiming to Increase Market Cap Through Stock Price Appreciation Rather Than Share Dilution
item.description: On August 12th, Charles Allen, the CEO of the US-listed company BTCS, stated that naked short selling is a predatory behavior that manipulates the market by artificially increasing market supply, driving down prices, and diluting the legitimate rights of shareholders. This behavior harms true long-term retail investors and must be stopped.Today, we believe that short sellers are betting on a decline in the BTCS stock price, expecting us to irresponsibly sell billions of dollars of stock through an At-The-Market (ATM) offering, allowing them to buy back at a lower price. As I have said before, my goal is to increase market value through stock price appreciation, not reckless share dilution.BTCS Inc. (BTCS) currently holds 70,000 ETH, valued at approximately $299.4 million, with a 30-day holding increase of 379.64%.

item.title: Hong Kong Stock Concept Stock Collective Surge, Fosun International Surges Over 19%
item.description: On August 12th, based on the market data from RockFlow (https://rockflow.ai/en/crypto-stocks?utm_campaign=blockBeats), the stablecoin concept stocks in the Hong Kong stock market witnessed a collective surge. Fosun International (00656.HK) rose by more than 19%, Duodian Technology (02586.HK) and Guotai Junan International (01788.HK) each rose by more than 8%, Yunfeng Financial Group (00376.HK) rose by more than 5%, and YeePay (09923.HK) rose by more than 4%.Earlier reports indicated that at 2 p.m. on August 12th, Fosun officially submitted an application for a stablecoin license in Hong Kong and had already formed a complete application team for the stablecoin license. On August 6th, Fosun's founder Guo Guangchang personally led the core team of Fosun's stablecoin team and some other senior executives to meet with Carrie Lam, the Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, and Paul Chan, the Financial Secretary of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, withi

item.title: Noble Token is expected to launch in the next 2 to 6 months.
item.description: On August 12th, during an AMA in 2025 (August 12th), the Noble team announced that the Noble token is expected to be launched within the next 2 to 6 months. The timing is set to take place after the launch of the Hyperliquid Treasury (estimated in 4 to 6 weeks). The team stated that they will adopt a cautious approach, giving priority to system readiness and community understanding rather than setting a fixed date. During the transition from the point system to the Noble token, the interests of early supporters will be taken into account while also attracting new users.

item.title: A newly created wallet withdrew 91,891 SOL from Kraken, equivalent to approximately $16.78 million.
item.description: On August 12th, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, a newly established wallet withdrew 91,891 SOL from Kraken, with a value of $16.78 million.

item.title: 1confirmation Founder: The Treasury Company Model Only Works When the Token Has Long-Term Store of Value Properties
item.description: On August 12th, Nick Tomaino, the founder of the crypto venture capital firm 1confirmation, stated that "Currently, each holder is seeking a custodial company to safeguard their assets. Nevertheless, the custodial model only functions when the market generally believes that cryptocurrencies possess a store of value function. Nobody is willing to enable a group of fraudulent insiders to make profits. This is where the most prominent difference lies between tokens that can serve as a store of value in a trustworthy and neutral manner and so-called 'company coins'."

item.title: Matrixport: Bitcoin Breaking Out of Triangle Pattern, Funds Continuously Flowing into Crypto Market
item.description: August 12th. Matrixport released today's market analysis, which stated, "Bitcoin is testing the upper boundary of a triangle consolidation range. During the Asian session, the price briefly surged but encountered selling pressure during the European and American sessions, resulting in a partial pullback of gains. If the price remains above $116,817, the breakout remains valid, and there is still potential for further upside in the short term."In the context of the current seasonally weak period, the price is likely to rise steadily rather than sharply. If the CPI exceeds expectations, it may temporarily shake market confidence in the Federal Reserve's two interest rate cuts this year. However, we still maintain that this expectation is in line with the long-term trend.Funds continue to flow into the crypto market through various channels, and long-term investors may enjoy rewards this year.

item.title: Since Tom Lee joined BitMine as Chairman on June 30, ETH has surged by 71% in the same period.
item.description: On August 12th, according to Ark Invest Daily, Tom Lee became Chairman of BitMine on June 30th. At that time, the price of ETH was approximately $2,500. Now, the price of ETH has risen to $4,300, representing a 71% increase since June 30th.It is reported that since Tom Lee's joining, BitMine has shifted its strategic focus to building the world's largest Ethereum treasury company and plans to acquire 5% of the total ETH supply. Currently, its ETH holdings amount to 1.15 million coins, with a value of around $4.96 billion.

item.title: H100 Group Appoints Brian Brookshire as Bitcoin Strategy Lead
item.description: August 12: The publicly listed company H100 Group in Sweden has named Brian Brookshire as the Director of Bitcoin Strategy. Brian Brookshire will collaborate closely with CEO Sander Andersen and COO Johannes Wiik. His main focus will be on further formulating the company's Bitcoin strategy, expediting the accumulation process, and enhancing communication and investor relations.

item.title: Monad's recent post hints at or suggests a mainnet launch later this year.
item.description: On August 12th, Monad sent out a tweet stating "Monad Mainnet" and attached an image featuring "2025", suggesting that the mainnet might be launched in the latter part of this year.

item.title: The US July CPI data will be released tonight at 8:30 PM.
item.description: On August 12th, the US July CPI data will be released tonight at 20:30 Beijing time.The market anticipates that core inflation will rebound moderately. Currently, there is a "hawk-dove standoff" within the Federal Reserve. If the data verifies tariff pass-through and economic uncertainty, the Fed's interest rate cut path may become more cautious. (FXStreet)
